description: Amendments to planning permission dated 23 May 2022 (RN: 21/07685/FULL) for variation of conditions 1, 14 and 17 of planning permission dated 29 August 2019 (RN:19/00531/FULL) for: Refurbishment and extensions to existing building including replacement of external facades; three additional floors at roof level plus rooftop access housing and plant enclosure; and terraces at second to seventh floor level; to provide retail (Class A1), office (Class B1) and nightclub (Sui Generis) floorspace, to allow changes to the rooftop plant enclosure, improvements to cycle storage space, amendments to the waste stores, revised massing at first to fourth floor level on the Goslett Yard elevation and changes to the approved facing materials.  Namely, to amend the description of development to read as follows: Amendments to planning permission dated 23 May 2022 (RN: 21/07685/FULL) for variation of conditions 1, 14 and 17 of planning permission dated 29th August 2019 (RN:19/00531/FULL) for the refurbishment and extensions to existing building including replacement of external facades; three additional floors at roof level plus rooftop access housing and plant enclosure; and terraces at second to seventh floor level; to provide commercial, business and service uses and nightclub (Sui Generis) floorspace.
